meanings.sent1: I will determine the winner of the game based on the final score.
meanings.sent2: The judge will determine the outcome of the court case.
meanings.sent3: After much debate, they flipped a coin to determine who would go first.
meanings.sent4: Her unwavering determination to succeed will determine her future.
meanings.sent5: The detective's keen eye for detail helped him determine the culprit.

meanings.sent1: Scientists use precise measurements to determine the weight of the object.
meanings.sent2: Please determine the exact time of the meeting so we can plan accordingly.
meanings.sent3: The detective used fingerprints to determine the identity of the suspect.
meanings.sent4: The compass needle always points north, helping sailors determine direction.
meanings.sent5: The doctor will determine the cause of the illness through thorough examination.

meanings.definition: To cause to come to a conclusion or resolution
meanings.sent1: The mediator will determine a solution that satisfies both parties.
meanings.sent2: The evidence presented will determine the final decision of the jury.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected plot twist in the movie will determine the fate of the main character.
meanings.sent4: The negotiation will determine the terms of the contract between the two companies.
meanings.sent5: The final test will determine whether the students pass the course or not.
